title: This games refined restrictions on trolls. Tell me what you think.
body:
So thats cool theres a chat restriction but if you have ever been in the 5th level of your division it won't help because a lot of people don't care enough and choose to troll anyway. 
Instead of restricting those offenders that do that in Ranked why not enforce a ranked restriction. If you can't act right don't play ranked. Im not a just ranting because of where I am at. I just think theres a better way to deal with trolls. That being said the restrictions should require the offender to play x number of normal games that don't conclude with them trolling. If they continue to troll they will receive a chat restriction also with the rank restriction. If they continue to offend by feeding intentionally and afking the offender will receive a 2 day ban. They only receive one of theses ban warnings. If they continue to troll after and beyond the 2 day ban the account is then banned completely.

If it exists, its not used.
